name: Coloplast A/S
description: Coloplast A/S is a global healthcare company founded in 1957, dedicated to developing innovative products and services for people with intimate healthcare needs. Based in Denmark, Coloplast specializes in three main product areas: ostomy care, urology, and wound & skin care. The company’s mission is to make life easier for people with intimate healthcare needs through high-quality products, education, and support. Coloplast's ostomy care products help individuals who have undergone surgery to manage their conditions with dignity and confidence. In the urology segment, the company offers solutions for patients with urinary incontinence and bladder dysfunction. Additionally, Coloplast’s wound care products are designed to promote healing and enhance the quality of life for individuals with chronic wounds. With a strong commitment to research and development, Coloplast continually invests in innovation to address the evolving needs of its customers. The company operates in over 40 countries and sells its products in more than 100 countries, positioning itself as a leader in the healthcare market focused on intimate care.

key_executives.name: Lars H. B. K. D. L. Iversen

seo.meta_description: Explore Coloplast A/S, a leader in healthcare products for ostomy, urology, and wound care. Committed to improving quality of life for patients worldwide.

faq.question: What does Coloplast specialize in?
faq.answer: Coloplast specializes in ostomy care, urology, and wound & skin care products.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Coloplast?
faq.answer: Lars Rasmussen is the CEO of Coloplast A/S.

faq.question: Where is Coloplast headquartered?
faq.answer: Coloplast is headquartered in Humlebæk, Denmark.

faq.question: What are Coloplast's main product areas?
faq.answer: Coloplast's main product areas include ostomy care, urology, and wound & skin care.
